title: Effects of Crusades and Arabic texts

content.question: A historian researching the effects of the Crusades on the diffusion of technology would probably find which of the following sources most useful?

choices.label: European crusaders’ accounts of Islamic religious practices
Muslim accounts of European royal marriages
Monks’ translations of Arabic mathematics texts brought from conquered territories
Birth records from villages along the routes used by the Crusaders

content.answer: Monks’ translations of Arabic mathematics texts brought from conquered territories

topic.text: 2.2: The Mongol Empire and the Making of the Modern World
